Summary: Triangle three white lights one red flashing in center, no noise
divs: Sighting Details10:37pm I was just now looking up into the sky hoping to see something from inside and it glided right over my place. I saw it clear as a bell. Triangular shaped craft with three white outer lights and a flashing red center light just above the redwoods. It was not in the flight path of regular airplanes and it was silent. At first I thought I saw something way up star distance away that disappeared and then this came around from the other direction ( heading west then veering south ) just after that. Then it disappeared past the tree line toward the ocean. It looked familiar. I saw one back in 1991 hovering above the trees in Vermont. I was scarred back then but not this time. Now 10:52pm saw a shooting star due north coming from the direction the triangle went in. The skies were clear with no wind.
trends: There have been 127 other sightings in San Francisco
There were no other sightings in San Francisco on or around August 8th 2009
